title: friends lol account
body: i have a friend that wants back in to his account but he dont know any of his old info. im rl friends with him and i can verify he account it. we are still friends in lol.  is there anything i can do to help him get hes account back{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I think it's really neat that you're concerned about your friend's account! ^.^

We can assist your friend if he submits a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provides *as much information* as he can recall about his account. One of our recovery specialists will get back in touch with him to assist with the recovery.

Let me know if you have any questions.
